name: Life Seed
description:
Complete the trials and decide the fate of your village.

Controls

  • Movement: wasd/arrows/space
  • Glide: Z or K
  • Fire: X or L
  • Respawn: R

Controller (tested with xbox 360 controller)

  • Movement: Left joystick or D-pad (useful in tricky spots)
  • Jump: A
  • Glide: B or Right Trigger
  • Fire: Y or Right Bumper
  • Respawn: Back Button

by

@Crefossus and...

Voice Acting: Jani Saarelainen

Music:

"Foreigner", "Pho" and "XX" by Jahzzar - Attribution-ShareAlike License.
"Leafless Quince Tree" by Rolemusic - Attribution License.
"Thinking Out Loud" by Kevin MacLeod - Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
"Crazy Fun" by Frank Nora CC0
